name: js-state-handler
description: A renderable state handler for states outside of frameworks

scripts.compile: npm run transpile-default && npm run transpile-min
scripts.transpile-default: babel src/StateHandler.js --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --presets es2015,stage-0 --out-file dist/StateHandler.js && babel src/StateHandler.js --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --presets es2015,stage-0 --out-file docs/StateHandler.js
scripts.test: standard src/**/*.js && echo TODO: Add tests

author: bdbch
